Mopedo is a Bike-Taxi hailing application integrated with advanced AI technology offering the most affordable and reliable commute service to every common man by considering every second of customer intent.

patterns: does mopedo confined only to bike taxi?
responses: The application provides Mopedo Bike and Auto services.

patterns: Is it safe to take up a ride in mopedo?
responses: The application ensures high-end security for users with safe and home free rides.

patterns: What are all the payment modes mopedo accepts?
Can I pay cash for the Mopedo?
responses: Mopedo allows cash payment and also accepts credit/debit cards, digital wallets(gpay, phonepe, paytm) which saves from hassle of tendering the exact change.

patterns: Is it possible to book a ride for others in mopedo?
can I book ride for my parents?
is there an option book ride for my friend?
responses: Anyone with the mopedo application can book a ride for themselves and guardians just by specifying the guardian’s details.

patterns: What's the unique thing about mopedo compared to other bike taxi services?
how is it diffrent from other bike taxi services?
responses: The all-new Mopedo application provides bike services just one click away to every individual. The application is completely automated with the latest AI technology inbuilt without giving a chance of stepping back.

patterns: How do users pay for charging thier EVs?
responses: Different EV charging stations have different provisions for payements which accepts multiple casheless options includes VISA, Mastercard, Credit cards and AMEX
It operates across major cities in India. These areas will change overtime as we grow our presence across the country.
Mopedo pricing depends upon Distance travelled, Minimum fare, Per km and Per min which vary based on the pickup and destination locations.

patterns: does mopedo includes waiting charges in their fare?
responses: The waiting fee will be charged only when the driver is bound to wait for more than 5min at the pickup location.

patterns: Do we have any distance limit?
how many km does it cover approx.?
Is there any minimum limit to mopedo?
how far can moepdo take me?
responses: Mopedo is confined to only about 40km from the point of pick-up location.

patterns: Does the mopedo pilot follow the safety precautions?
responses: Yes, our driver pilots are informed to follow the agreed customer limits and precautionary measures.

patterns: Can I schedule my ride in advance?
does mopedo provides an option to book ride in prior?
responses: Yes, you can schedule a ride in advance within 24 hours.
The ride cancellation request can be raised before the onboarding ETA and will not be charged unless the request exceeds the ETA?

patterns: Is the Mopedo bike taxi application user-friendly for women?
can women takeup a ride with mopedo without any second thought?
responses: It's absolutely a woman friendly application with no hassling risks from the pilots.

patterns: Can I view my ride history?
will there be any section to view the history of ride?
responses: Every ride information with mopedo is automatically saved wherein you can view it in the ride history section
Anyone who wants to earn can get registered with mopedo. No one would be restricted on the basis of gender.

patterns: Does Mopedo provide 24 hour ride service?
can i book mopedo ride during night times?
does mopedo operates a 24hours a day?
responses: Customers can book mopedo rides between 6am - midnight

patterns: What details does mopedo provide customers about the pilots during the  onboarding process?
responses: Once after the ride gets confirmed, you can see the pilot's details which includes Name, Mobile Number, Vehicle number along with a photograph.

patterns: does mopedo gives users accurate ETA
is ETA visible to us is accurate?
responses: ETA given by mopedo is likely to be the approximate time for the driver to reach the pick-up location from his/her current location.

patterns: How can we get registered with Mopedo?
responses: If you want to get started as a pilot, please download the mopedo Driver application from  playstore. And follow up with the guidelines suggested by the application.If you want to get started as a customer, please download the mopedo taxi(customer) application from  playstore. And follow up with the guidelines suggested by the application.

patterns: does mopedo provide any insurance policy for rides?
what is mopedo ride insurance policy?
is there any insurance policy provided mopedo?
responses: Mopedo offers a group insurance worth Rs. 5lakhs for their customers in case of unexpected accidents that take place during the ride.

patterns: How many customers can travel per ride with mopedo?
customers allowed to travel per ride?
responses: Mopedo bike allows a single customer per ride.Mopedo Auto allows two customers per ride.

patterns: How can we track our ride?
does mopedo allows to track ride?
responses: Once your booking is confirmed, you’ll be able to track your ride on the main map screen and view the following details in the Map section. Within the application dashboard.Driver ETA and current location, Driver route to your pick-up address, And whole estimated distance of your ride.

patterns: What does “refer a friend policy mean?
can we refer friends to use mopedo app?
do we have any benefits by referring a friend?
responses: The registered customers can refer the application through a sharable link to others and gain bonus rewards. These bonus rewards can be redeemed and used for the next ride.

patterns: Can we save our favourite destinations?
responses: Mopedo provides an option to save your preferred destinations.
for further information, you can reach us at info@mopeod.in
